It seems no amount of caffeine or exercise will wake me up fully. I just feel all sluggish and sleepy no matter what i do or how much i sleep.

Which is strange because i'm not supposed to have any deficiencies or anything like that. Could just be the fact that i don't get any daylight.

Also, my depression's worsening. Hooray!
